item.title: Chelsey Crisp • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #157
item.itunes:title: Chelsey Crisp • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #157
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the sensational actor, writer and improviser CHELSEY CRISP!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the sensational actor, writer and improviser CHELSEY CRISP!


Fantastic times ahead for you dear listener, with this team up of Brett and Chelsey featuring all the film, life and death talk you could wish for. You may remember her husband Rhett Reese back in the days of episode 123 - well, here’s your chance to ying that episode’s yang with a harmonious linking of awesome episodes right here. Chelsey expands on all things including having a partner in the business and the many varied positives it brings, differences between US and UK sets, Phoenix Arizona origins, being a thrillseeker, past stints on Fear Factor, the difference between acting and lying, Dutchess Riot and putting shows at drama school. Enjoy, you surely shall - and don’t miss all the goodies she’s got going on over on the big and small screen too!

item.itunes:title: Danny Wallace • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #156
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent writer, director, author and Yes Man DANNY WALLACE!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent writer, director, author and Yes Man DANNY WALLACE!


A lovely team up with Brett and Danny, as they get to the business of life and films quickly and efficiently via all kinds of lovely tangents and diversions along the way. You will be very happy you made the journey with them, as they tackle such items as ghosts and ghost watches (coming up with a bulletproof premise in the process), Danny’s ‘Yes Man’ book and the absolute life changing roller coaster ride which ensued, crying, being scared by non-horrors (all is possible), and a great amount more. Danny’s always a good time, you’ll thoroughly enjoy this one.

item.title: Romesh Ranganathan - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #155
item.itunes:title: Romesh Ranganathan - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #155
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe for the second time in a RESURRECTION EDITION of the podcast - this time it’s national treasure ROMESH RANGANATHAN!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe for the second time in a RESURRECTION EDITION of the podcast - this time it’s national treasure ROMESH RANGANATHAN!


Episode 93. April 2020. The pandemic is young but fierce. Time has felt at times like a flat circle but also an accordian, compressing and stretching and making us all feel out of sync to say the least. A lot has changed since that day in history, not least of which being the resurrection of the homie Romesh! (that was a long way round, whew… I hope everyone’s okay) This is his second run at the greatest film setlist of all time, with new tales, new fun, and new films! One for the books. You shall for certain enjoy this. Bests to you all.


ROMESH LINKS

item.itunes:title: Rose Johnson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #154
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with writer, comic, actor, sketco and Birthday Girl ROSE JOHNSON!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with writer, comic, actor, sketco and Birthday Girl ROSE JOHNSON!


A pure treat for you this week as Rose rocks the afterlife (or not afterlife) with grace and finesse. She and Brett get down to the whole bit, including no bitching in heaven, toes, the wide world of commercial acting (including audio examples), the sad backdrop and the mechanics of the self-tape, from Devon to the big lights, writing a book in lockdown, nature’s television, not enjoying a scare, and family dynamics. Action packed and super fun - you are sure to enjoy Rose!

item.itunes:title: Pearl Mackie • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #153
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with wonderful and pure gold actor PEARL MACKIE!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with wonderful and pure gold actor PEARL MACKIE!


Pearl absolutely smashed this episode, so let’s just address that before moving forward. From rocking fabulous hair (audio listeners will vibe off the energy, while video viewers will be able to enjoy in full on Patreon), to going in on current and previous projects, Judy Garland, singing, scares, tears, “smooky” films, the cutest hand holding in history, feeling seen, right up to sexy foxes, Pearl brings it and you will love her and this episode. What a goody. Enjoy!

LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent writer, comic and podcaster JOE WILKINSON!


He is so much more than those three simple descriptors of course - you will have seen or heard him on a lot of bits and pieces over the years, certainly in podcast form at the very least. This is a perfect chance to get better acquainted with Joe, as he teams up with Brett for a unique blend of selections and insights, all delivered back on those early heydays of a young lockdown. item.title: Maisie Williams • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #151
item.itunes:title: Maisie Williams • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #151
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with none other than Arya Stark from Game Of Thrones - it’s MAISIE WILLIAMS!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with none other than Arya Stark herself - it’s MAISIE WILLIAMS!


Of course it goes without saying that Maisie is an entire human being and not simply a character from one of the hugest series in television history (for the non-viewers - a hint - IT'S GAME OF THRONES). It’s a treat to hear her selections on here and all about her paths and choices, likes and dislikes and all the life stuff that you would hope for. As ever, when the spirit takes, the show can enter some deep waters so keep an eye on the shore in case, but if you’re game, you’re in for some real openness and pure podcast magic, including end of level life bosses, rebooting Jaws, resetting scenes when filming and how the hell that works, and whether or not you can get lost in a film if you’re in the business… Hooray for Maisie, you’ll love this!


LIVE FILMS TO BE BURIED WITH in London! JULY 3rd! DETAILS HERE!

item.title: Scroobius Pip - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #150
item.itunes:title: Scroobius Pip - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #150
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe for the second time in a RESURRECTION EDITION of the podcast - this time it’s Distraction Pieces own SCROOBIUS PIP!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe for the second time in a RESURRECTION EDITION of the podcast - this time it’s Distraction Pieces own SCROOBIUS PIP!


You may recall Young Pip’s debut back in episode 4 - yes, over 146 episodes ago - where Brett threw him in a coffin and slung a DVD in there for his ascension to the Good Place. This time round, we have him back as Brett reanimates him for another crack at the film code, which includes all things from Pip’s recent Canadian acting missions, lockdown, mistaken celebrity sightings, sneaking films on set, lifting the curtain behind the scenes, beating up critics (this time not involving Uwe Boll - Google that), and cinema time with The Pips! Super enjoyable goodness as you would rightfully expect, have fun!


FILMS TO BE BURIED WITH • LIVE! • JULY 3rd • CLICK HERE FOR DETAILS!

item.itunes:title: Russell T. Davies • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #149
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with undenied genius writer and creator of much goodness RUSSELL T. DAVIES!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with undenied genius writer and creator of much goodness RUSSELL T. DAVIES!


A delightful chat with Brett and Russell as they get into the whole back catalogue, which includes Dr Who, Queer As Folk, It’s A Sin and just a huge amount more - with a whole bunch of further fun including his ‘mad brain’, the dialogue switch being always on, not having time off as a writer (due to said dialogue switch), Portalbot memories, ‘L’esprit d’escalier’ and - speaking of staircases - “SPLAY!”. All will become clear. You’ll have a great time with this one!

item.itunes:title: Chris Addison • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #148
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with absolute top choice comedian, actor and director CHRIS ADDISON!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with absolute top choice comedian, actor and director CHRIS ADDISON!


The weirdest thing about this episode is that this is the first time Brett and Chris have gotten together like this, as they seem so perfectly matched - nevertheless, here it is in podcast form at long last. Chris goes into his sandwich shop past, The Thick Of It, The Hustle, Breeders, Edinburgh Fringe experiences (which never get old on here - it’s a fascinating world), gentle love, NOT horror, YES crying, test screenings and Cusack vibes. You’ll love it!

item.title: Teri Hatcher • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #147
item.itunes:title: Teri Hatcher • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #147
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with world renowned actor and all round superperson TERI HATCHER!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with world renowned actor and all round superperson TERI HATCHER!


…invoking a Superperson on purpose there as you may well know her from being Lois Lane in a galaxy far, far away. Teri is fantastic and such a delight to have on the podcast, and so up for playing too which always makes it a fun episode. Hear it all, from her ayahuasca journey, to her tales of meeting Brett for the first time, to her camper van and subsequent therapy sessions therein, horror films and being scared not only of the content but the names themselves, and her love of dancing from a young age. It’s a treat - so people, please enjoy your friend TERI HATCHER!

item.title: Jenny Johnson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #146
item.itunes:title: Jenny Johnson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #146
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the warm and friendly and very hilarious comic JENNY JOHNSON!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the warm and friendly and very hilarious comic JENNY JOHNSON!


This is another awesome one with all the fun and energy of those rare and treasured person-to-person episodes that - well, may one day come back WHO KNOWS?! Anyway - that’s besides the point. Jenny is a proper shining star here as she gets down to this existential pickle we’re all in via the moving image, which kicks off with pure earned experiential observations about Zoom gigs and online comedy, her observations on what comedy might resemble once services resume (or evolve through where they are currently at least), doing ‘corporates’ and just so much more. I mean that’s only the first 15 minutes up top. Imagine the rest. Enjoy the company of Jenny Johnson!

item.title: Neil Marshall (director) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #145
item.itunes:title: Neil Marshall (director) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #145
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the truly excellent director NEIL MARSHALL!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the truly excellent director NEIL MARSHALL!


Well first off - have you seen The Descent? No? Oh. Okay. Wow. I actually wasn’t expecting that. So first off, go and get that sorted. Everyone else - while we wait for the pre-Descent watchers to catch up, you’re in for a solid treat here as Neil not only goes into depth about some of the background ‘behind the curtain’ goodies on the film, he also of course delves deep into his filmography, cinema history, his on-set manners, and all kinds of nice stuff pertaining to his rich and varied career. By the way, if you haven’t seen The Descent - you’ll get on just fine with this - but do watch it, seriously. It’s insanely good.

item.title: Tiffany Stevenson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #144
item.itunes:title: Tiffany Stevenson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #144
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with all round comic and writing heavy hitter TIFFANY STEVENSON!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with all round comic and writing heavy hitter TIFFANY STEVENSON!


A bright and breezy stroll through all things film and funny, taking in all the sights and sounds from the cinematic backdrop along the way, peppered with good old fashioned existential angst and ponderings. Tiffany is perfectly placed to deliver science on all these topics, from comedy shows over the past year (through the whole ordeal), death as motivational device, having a covers band star as a dad, cigarette smoke, old skool cinema snax and the joys of combining digital physical media collections with a significant other! Lovely stuff. Have fun!

item.title: Drew Pearce • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #143
item.itunes:title: Drew Pearce • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #143
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with fabulouss screenwriter, director and producer DREW PEARCE!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with fabulouss screenwriter, director and producer DREW PEARCE!


From UK to Hollywood, where he now makes his home, Drew has been at the core of many an awesome piece of work including Iron Man 3, Hobbs & Shaw and Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation among a ton of others (you might know No Heroics in there too - it’s a long list though!), and now’s the chance for you to get to know him a little better. He and Brett have a great chat and get into all things film in as much depth as you could wish for. It’s ace too because the combined knowledge and showbiz tales are freeflowing and riveting, so you can expect a truly entertaining episode right here including a near death experience in Amoeba Records, a deep fascination with home invasion and lock-in movies and being ‘happy-wary’. But SO much more. You’ll enjoy!


DREW LINKS

item.title: Ashley Nicole Black • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #142
item.itunes:title: Ashley Nicole Black • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #142
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with hilarious writer, actor and comedian ASHLEY NICOLE BLACK!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with hilarious writer, actor and comedian ASHLEY NICOLE BLACK!


Master of many facets of the comedy diamond, Ashley Nicole is a beaming ray of light on a truly strange and not all that happy year, making this episode a proper treat for your ears. If you’re yet to make Ashley’s acquaintance, prepare for a fine introduction as she and Brett get into all things life, death and cinema including how inhumanly good she is at what she does, writers room science, her minister dad, being bored, “My closets are clean!”, religion as organized gossip, being a perfect blend of her parents, old people in black and white, and being easily manipulated by cinema. So much fun. You shall enjoy for sure. Get involved!

item.title: Doug Benson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #141
item.itunes:title: Doug Benson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #141
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with veteran podcaster, documentarian and enthusiast of all things good and green, it’s DOUG BENSON!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with veteran podcaster, documentarian and enthusiast of all things good and green, it’s DOUG BENSON!


Whether you picked up on Doug’s illustrious career as an early adopter of the podcast form with Doug Loves Movies, his standup side, or his documentaries, Doug’s mad busy out there creating content and fighting the good fight. He and Brett are perfectly suited right here in a joyful celebration of films through the ages (well, certainly last century anyway) covering all the good stuff including pandemic movie watching habits, how the standup comedy game has changed post-pandemic, “I’m here, Show Business!”, open minded parents, emotions in later life, men in trenchcoats and crying over joy rather than grief… But so much more, as you will surely know by now. Please enjoy the wide world of Doug!

item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the nationally treasured star and host GABY ROSLIN!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the nationally treasured star and host GABY ROSLIN!


Whether you know Gaby from the cherished Big Breakfast days, her radio show career, appearances on stage or the other many facets of her busy world, Gaby is undeniable and one of the greats of the UK media world in general. It’s a pleasure to hear her talk all things cinematic, and to hear an interviewer on the other end of the interview stick (they call them mics don’t they, apologies) - so prepare for all manner of gems and jewels from the on-mic and on-air world, her acting and singing, videos, romcoms, “No did YOU like the film?”, and all kinds of nice goodies. Enjoy!

item.title: Jamali Maddix • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #139
item.itunes:title: Jamali Maddix • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #139
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the always excellent and very funny JAMALI MADDIX!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the always excellent and very funny JAMALI MADDIX!


As adept on stage as he is in front of the camera, Jamali has been insanely busy over the past few years and here’s a chance to get up to speed on it all… From comedy to documentary making by way of ‘Hate Thy Neighbour’, you’ll hear about some of the many heavy situations he’s found himself in, which he has met with good humour and logic. But damn. He’s been able to weave out of being typecast though in some very smart moves which led him to Taskmaster, though not without some non-documentary related near deathe experiences along the way and all manner of mad stories to accompany. Another action packed episode folks, enjoy!!

item.title: FTBBW REWIND! • Roisin Conaty (live @ The BFI) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein
item.itunes:title: FTBBW REWIND! • Roisin Conaty (live @ The BFI) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! THE REWIND!!!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the wonderful comedian and Gameface writer / star ROISIN CONATY!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! THE REWIND!!!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the wonderful comedian and Gameface writer / star ROISIN CONATY!


(Brett explains everything in the episode intro, but just so you know - below is the original write-up for the episode... It was originally released mid

2019 or so)


This one was recorded LIVE on location at the BFI, at the Southbank in London - were you there? Maybe you were! What a killer show it was… Well, thankfully the goodness from that very night was captured in 1s and 0s all for your listening enjoyment in the event that you were unable to attend (or indeed if you want to relive the occasion) - a great show from start to end, as Brett and Roisin throw down about all things film, life and more - hear all about it, from Roisin’s show ‘Gameface’, to her wet hair napping exploits, to tricky animal films and the trouble within, problems with the film Cocktail, Pat Sharpe haircuts and the thrill of a film’s writing when you can’t ‘hear the typewriter’. Greatness and glory throughout - a fun ride, so strap in and go have fun!


EPISODE LINKS:

• ROISIN on THE INTERNET!

• ROISIN on TWITTER

• GAMEFACE!

• 8 OUT OF 10 CATS!

item.title: Menus To Be Buried With (with Ed Gamble, James Acaster & Brett Goldstein) • Comic Relief 2021
item.itunes:title: Menus To Be Buried With (with Ed Gamble, James Acaster & Brett Goldstein) • Comic Relief 2021
item.itunes:subtitle: As part of Acast's Red Nose Day Podcast Mashup, Brett teamed up with James and Ed of the almighty Off Menu podcast to get all up in each others business, creating a wonderful monster mashup in the process. This is Menus To Be Buried With!
item.description:
As part of Acast's Red Nose Day Podcast Mashup, Brett teamed up with James and Ed of the almighty Off Menu podcast to get all up in each others business, creating a wonderful monster mashup in the process.

The result? YES INDEED, you guessed correctly - this is Menus To Be Buried With! LOOK OUT!


Donations have the power to help people living incredibly tough lives.

If you can, please, head to comicrelief.com/podcastmashup and give now. Or give £5 by texting ‘COMIC’ to 70205.

To donate £5 text the word COMIC to 70205. Texts cost your donation amount plus your standard network message charge and 100% of your donation will go to Comic Relief, a registered charity. You must be 16 or over and please ask the bill-payer’s permission. For full terms and conditions visit comicrelief.com/podcastmashup

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/filmstobeburiedwith.

item.title: James Gill (live at Always Be Comedy) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #138
item.itunes:title: James Gill (live at Always Be Comedy) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #138
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe in this LIVE episode with the fantastic JAMES GILL, comedian and founder of Always Be Comedy!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe in this LIVE episode with the fantastic JAMES GILL, comedian and founder of Always Be Comedy!


As a matter of fact - this episode was recorded via Always Be Comedy - so now everything is all tied up with a neat little bow! It’s a lovely episode, and a great switchup to the usual format in a time when live in person shows are not available. James is excellent and he and Brett work it perfectly - the only thing that is a little different is the laugh track you might expect…! A peek behind the curtain here - so this is producer Buddy Peace talking to you breaking the fourth wall a little - basically, the laugh track would have been impossible for a lot of sync/sound-related reasons, but just know that Brett and James were in front of a Zoom audience and it was very much live! It’s a great one, so please enjoy a lovely live Films To Be Buried With!

item.itunes:summary:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe in this LIVE episode with the fantastic JAMES GILL, comedian and founder of Always Be Comedy!


As a matter of fact - this episode was recorded via Always Be Comedy - so now everything is all tied up with a neat little bow! It’s a lovely episode, and a great switchup to the usual format in a time when live in person shows are not available. James is excellent and he and Brett work it perfectly - the only thing that is a little different is the laugh track you might expect…! A peek behind the curtain here - so this is producer Buddy Peace talking to you breaking the fourth wall a little - basically, the laugh track would have been impossible for a lot of sync/sound-related reasons, but just know that Brett and James were in front of a Zoom audience and it was very much live! It’s a great one, so please enjoy a lovely live Films To Be Buried With!

item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the absolute human diamond that is YVETTE NICOLE BROWN!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the absolute human diamond that is YVETTE NICOLE BROWN!


You will know Yvette from something. That much is sure. She’s been putting in work for a minute now and that work is of the highest order, so whether it’s from television to voiceover to fully fledged superhero movie, she is immensely prolific. She is also an amazing guest, as someone who is very in tune with people vibes while bringing us all closer together in ways we never expected. Just ask Brett and his writing team! What more would you expect from someone who describes people as ‘delicious’? Get to know Yvette so much better throughout this lovely episode including her being a radiator, helping and being a helper, ugly crying and being a recluse. And a blerd. Yvette contains multitudes. ENJOY!

item.title: Matthew Crosby - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #136
item.itunes:title: Matthew Crosby - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #136
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with fabulous comedian and sketcher MATTHEW CROSBY! Though not as you know it…For this is the almighty RESURRECTION EDITION!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with fabulous comedian and sketcher MATTHEW CROSBY! Though not as you know it…

For this is the almighty RESURRECTION EDITION!


Poor Matthew has been stuck in purgatory limbo all the while since his last appearance, and now is his chance to finally reckon with a vengeful Brett, who strikes down upon thee with great vengeance and fuuuuurious anger, those who attempt to poison and destroy his brother. Or some such. Anyway - expect to hear extensive cat talk, baby talk, catbaby talk, routines, the Mr Tumble parental hierarchy, parenting choices, action films, not fanning out over people, cinema foyer awkwardness and Warhol film tactics. It’s all here, folks. Jeez. What a smash. Enjoy!

item.title: Kiell Smith-Bynoe • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #135
item.itunes:title: Kiell Smith-Bynoe • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #135
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with acting overlord KIELL SMITH-BYNOE!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with acting overlord KIELL SMITH-BYNOE!


A super nice get-along with Brett and Kiell as they proper get into it on the subject of this whole life and death and film thing… Kiell is busy filming in Guadalupe (being tested like 5 times every hour, don’t ya worry) which must have been tough for Brett having to view screensaver / wallpaper-perfect views of paradise coming from Kiell’s zoom view. It’s great though, as they get into all he’s doing, been up to, past lives, not a yes and not a no, pots of despair, therapy, drama school madness, shedding no tears and past rap interest. There was a degree of environmental wind to balance out so this might not sound quite as ‘full’ as your regularly scheduled episodes - you shouldn’t notice too much upheaval though. ANYWAY - enjoy, it’s a goody….

item.itunes:title: Brene Brown • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #134
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with professor, podcaster, TED talker and absolute delight BRENE BROWN!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with professor, podcaster, TED talker and absolute delight BRENE BROWN!


What a treat this episode is. Brene is a true champion in all realms, but you may know her from all things web-based, including her multi-million viewed TED Talks and her amazing podcast. Now is your chance to get better acquainted with the film lover Brene, as she and Brett get into all things cinematic. So much to enjoy from all tangents including her 'shame research', sharing common ground with standup, not being a horror fan in any way, and puns vs slapstick. Everyone, please welcome the phenomenon that is proud Texan BRENE BROWN!

LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe AND all the films of 2020 (at long last) with NISH KUMAR! PART 2!


In terms of format, you could say that this is very much like part 1. In fact, it's identical. But with different words. Sometimes the same words, but in different orders. So who's to say... Whatever happens - this is the perfect conclusion to part 1, and seals the deal on 2020's cinematic output rather nicely! You want closure? FRIEND, YOU GOT IT!

item.title: Julian Barratt • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #131
item.itunes:title: Julian Barratt • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #131
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with comic, writer and actor supreme JULIAN BARRATT!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with comic, writer and actor supreme JULIAN BARRATT!


A breezy and relaxed back and forth with Brett and Julian, as they get to work on matters existential and cinematic. They get into the Julian archives and his incredible previous work in Boosh, Mindhorn, Flowers and so much more (a very brief look at his IMDB will show you just some of that!), as well as watching Boosh through a childs eyes, tricks for getting out of your own way, the hour of the wolf, guitar love, dying on stage (metaphorically) and the wafer thin difference between art films and popcorn films. Ace stuff, please enjoy!

item.title: Moon Zappa • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #129
item.itunes:title: Moon Zappa • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #129
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent and really fun actor and writer MOON ZAPPA!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent and really fun actor and writer MOON ZAPPA!


You’ll surely recognize her surname, but that is not why we’re here today… Moon has been making power moves out there in the US for a while now, with a huge amount of work to her name, and this week it’s her time to talk about all things movies, from her childhood days up to the present. It’s a superb selection of cinematic treats of course, but on top of that there are dips into such topics as the ‘forever library’, being ultra intuitive as a kid, having a very specific nervous system and how it came about, her parents (specifically her father Frank), and the utter madness inspired by book tours. So much to dig into, and a fantastic ride as the first episode of 2021!


MOON on TWITTER

AMERICAN THE BEAUTIFUL

item.title: Curtis Stigers • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #128
item.itunes:title: Curtis Stigers • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #128
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the fantastic musician and all round lovely guy CURTIS STIGERS!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the fantastic musician and all round lovely guy CURTIS STIGERS!


What a treat - Curtis on FTBBW! You’ll surely know his music from various point in the past (which is obviously relative in terms of present and future), but if you are not familiar with the man, maybe you’ll know him from the theme from Sons Of Anarchy? THERE it is! This is a lovely laid back one with Brett and Curtis, and really nice to hear a guest being so in on it all and up for playing around too. Always a treat. This will be released on New Year’s Eve 2020, and from everyone here at Films To Be Buried With (this is Buddy typing this!) - we all feel it’s the perfect sign-off to year where everything has been insane. More importantly though - we all wish you nothing but the best for 2021. Let’s all hold hands and jump into this one together. BEST OF LUCK EVERYONE! Love you XX

item.itunes:summary:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the fantastic musician and all round lovely guy CURTIS STIGERS!


What a treat - Curtis on FTBBW! You’ll surely know his music from various point in the past (which is obviously relative in terms of present and future), but if you are not familiar with the man, maybe you’ll know him from the theme from Sons Of Anarchy? THERE it is! This is a lovely laid back one with Brett and Curtis, and really nice to hear a guest being so in on it all and up for playing around too. Always a treat. This will be released on New Year’s Eve 2020, and from everyone here at Films To Be Buried With (this is Buddy typing this!) - we all feel it’s the perfect sign-off to year where everything has been insane. More importantly though - we all wish you nothing but the best for 2021. Let’s all hold hands and jump into this one together. BEST OF LUCK EVERYONE! Love you XX

item.title: Edgar Wright (part 2 of 2) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #127
item.itunes:title: Edgar Wright (part 2 of 2) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #127
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein for a two parter as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the incredible film maker EDGAR WRIGHT!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the incredible film maker EDGAR WRIGHT! And this is no regular Films To Be Buried With, friends - well, for two reasons!

A. It’s Christmas! (Apologies if that was a spoiler…)

B. It was recorded on a socially distant walk through Regents Park in London!


It’s a real pleasure to hear Brett and Edgar wrap up the year in fine fashion, but the extra special element is the fact that it’s an actual person meet-up and outdoors at that. Zoom meetings became a necessity this year for obvious reasons, which acually brings many handy advantages, but it’s a refreshing energy in the face to face (or side by side) podcasts. You’ll hear that with this awesome two parter with Edgar, which contains just about all the movie making gossip and behind the curtain goodness you could wish for (some true gems here, trust me), including almost everything in his filmography as well as all the regular business you can expect from FTBBW. This is a two parter so catch em both and ENJOY! Merry Christmas one and all!


EDGAR on TWITTER

EDGAR on IMDB

item.title: James McNicholas - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #125
item.itunes:title: James McNicholas - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #125
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with JAMES McNICHOLAS! Ah HAH - but - you know what this one is… Yes indeed dear listener, this is the RESURRECTION EDITION!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with JAMES McNICHOLAS! Ah HAH - but - you know what this one is… Yes indeed dear listener, this is the RESURRECTION EDITION!


Turns out James did NOT die - or rather - he did but Brett went and brung him back didn’t he! So here is your encore listener (and James - DON’T MESS THIS UP!), and for those who missed him first time round - prepare for a really great catch up revolving around all those key ingredients; life, death, film, moving house, marriage, pandemic, therapy, sexy novels, eerie football games in the now times, ‘Mal De Debarquement’ (James will explain), whales, The Boxer, and all that good stuff PLUS he and Brett might have stumbled upon the greatest film ever made! It was right here all along! Please enjoy the resurrection of James 'Beast' McNicholas!


JAMES on TWITTER

ARSECAST

THE BOXER

item.title: Christa Miller • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #124
item.itunes:title: Christa Miller • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #124
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with renowned and brilliant comic actor CHRISTA MILLER!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with renowned and brilliant comic actor CHRISTA MILLER!


A true joy this week, as Brett catches up with Christa over the mostly calm and mirror-surfaced oceans of the internet connection wonderworld. A true pleasure to hear from Christa, with a really fun and bubbly session of all things afterlife. It kicks off with an insanely great death premise fit for any film and doesn’t let up from there! If you’re not yet familiar with Christa, have a look at her previous work on Cougar Town, Scrubs, The Drew Carey Show and - yes, she has even appeared on Seinfeld. Need you look any further! Enjoy - it’s a goody.

item.title: Rhett Reese • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #123
item.itunes:title: Rhett Reese • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #123
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with heavyweight screenwriter and producer RHETT REESE!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with heavyweight screenwriter and producer RHETT REESE!


If you are not familiar with Rhett himself, you will absolutely be familiar with his incredible output and contributions to cinema in general… Did you see Deadpool? Ever heard of Zombieland? That is a mere TWO examples of some of the massive projects Rhett has had a hand in, along with frequent co-conspirator Paul Wernick. In fact, you’ll hear all about how that relationship works in the writing world and homelife, along with the whole process of getting Deadpool and Zombieland to screen (a long process, by the way!), as well as working with Ryan Reynolds, and an absolute ton of awesome film choices that will inspire you and make you pull that curious face when something makes you go “Huh…” (or “Hmmm…” if you’re into the whole C&C Music Factory thing, and why not). Ace, enjoy!

item.title: Kemah Bob • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #122
item.itunes:title: Kemah Bob • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #122
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the brilliant comedian and writer KEMAH BOB!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the brilliant comedian and writer KEMAH BOB!


The absolutely perfect and essential introduction to the world of Kemah, should you have not made her acquaintance just yet! Kemah’s ace, and breezes through the lineup of inquisitive Brett nuggets with grace and proper fun, hitting on subjects including being in more of a TV than film place right now, working with Nish on Hello America and what it’s REALLY like to have him as a boss, being Texan, candy flipping and hippy tripping, finding one’s inner sad baby, growing up in an ‘area’ and the rule of 88! It’s all here. Enjoy!!

item.title: Patton Oswalt • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #121
item.itunes:title: Patton Oswalt • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #121
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with universally loved actor, comedian and writer PATTON OSWALT!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with universally loved actor, comedian and writer PATTON OSWALT!


One for the books, people - you’ll love this! Join Brett and Patton as they get into it in fine fashion, covering it all - the joys and pains of Zoom comedy shows (there are ways of doing it well!), comedy specials and Pattons run of greatness, the film Young Adult which FTBBW fans will know is one of Bretts faves, old souls, the bad judgment of parents when showing films to children and the simple pleasure of people doing good things in the face of adversity in films. You’ll enjoy from start to end!

item.title: Mary Beth Barone • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #120
item.itunes:title: Mary Beth Barone • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #120
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the fantastic comedian, improviser and actor MARY BETH BARONE!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the fantastic comedian, improviser and actor MARY BETH BARONE!


An instantly enjoyable episode with Brett and Mary Beth, darting around with grace and finesse through a heck-ton of topics - one of which will answer that old chestnut, as old as time itself - what exactly is a fuckboy? Prepare to be surprised or have your suspicions confirmed. Elsewhere you’ll get to hear about it all including big city fears, staring into fires, pandemic emotional floodgates, love being love, Chris Nolan, time and space and a special treat where she recreates a scene just for you the listening audience! Truly excellent. Everyone, enjoy Mary Beth Barone!


EPISODE LINKS:

An instantly enjoyable episode with Brett and Mary Beth, darting around with grace and finesse through a heck-ton of topics - one of which will answer that old chestnut, as old as time itself - what exactly is a fuckboy? Prepare to be surprised or have your suspicions confirmed. Elsewhere you’ll get to hear about it all including big city fears, staring into fires, pandemic emotional floodgates, love being love, Chris Nolan, time and space and a special treat where she recreates a scene just for you the listening audience! Truly excellent. Everyone, enjoy Mary Beth Barone!

item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the marvellous writer and actor and Ted Lasso affiliate BRENDAN HUNT!


A superb episode where Brett and Brendan meet up for some across the pond goodness to catch up on all things life and death through films, bonding even further in the process and giving us, the listening audience a thorough treat… So much to enjoy featuring some behind the scenes Ted Lasso biz, Gary Lineker, family reunions, existential childhood films, and a thrilling betting moment - the results of which may shock and surprise you… No spoilers though, it’s all yours to crack open and witness. Please enjoy Brendan Hunt!

item.title: Michael Jibson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #118
item.itunes:title: Michael Jibson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #118
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent actor, writer and director MICHAEL JIBSON!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent actor, writer and director MICHAEL JIBSON!


Another proper fun episode with some great insider info on all sorts, including that very special runaway success Hamilton - Michael was in the UK run, so there are some ace nuggets and pearls for sure… Sounds like a full on one…! But that’s not all, of course, as he and Brett cover all bases including Michael being the master of pauses, bringing his best to shows where audiences have planned for ages in advance to show up, the Madness musical, Rob Reiner as international treasure, nostalgia and classics and memories of memories. Class stuff, you shall enjoy!


FILMS TO BE BURIED WITH • Live! • October 24th!

item.itunes:title: Luke McQueen • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #117
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the hilarious, enigmatic and downright unique LUKE McQUEEN!A real fun ride from start to end as the two go head to head o...
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the hilarious, enigmatic and downright unique LUKE McQUEEN!


A real fun ride from start to end as the two go head to head on all things film and life, and it’s an interesting one as with all pre-lockdown episodes, as it was recorded in person in a building with two people sitting in close proximity. So there’s that! And it was stormy too which adds a real ambience to proceedings. Some really cool stuff in here, and probably too much to even hint at here so just dive on and rejoice in the escapist greatness with Brett and Luke!

item.title: Susan Wokoma • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #116
item.itunes:title: Susan Wokoma • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #116
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the wonderful actor, writer and comic SUSAN WOKOMA!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the wonderful actor, writer and comic SUSAN WOKOMA!


A proper fun time with Susan right here, as she and Brett get into the whole existential mess one film at a time. Listen to them get into a whole ton of mad tangents including a very solid premise for a reality show (I won’t even spoil it by mentioning the name - it’s brilliant), her involvement in the writer’s room on Sex Education, her Sky short ‘Love The Sinner’ which sounds amazing, being a bit psychic, thoughts on Capricorns, sleep paralysis, Nollywood, Abba pilgrimages, and her acting world! So much goodness and good times, you’ll love it. Please enjoy SUSAN WOKOMA!

item.title: Jen Brister - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #115
item.itunes:title: Jen Brister - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #115
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with JEN BRISTER - THE RESURRECTION!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with JEN BRISTER! Though, Films To Be Buried With listeners, this is the second time she’s been on (in fact the second time on any podcast, by her reckoning!) as this is is the RESURRECTION edition!


A beautiful encore covering everything since her last appearance and a whole load more, as you shall hear… Life has taken many a path since those days back in the pre-teen episodes of the podcast (Jen made her FTBBW debut on episode 11), including the addition of children, a fresh new pandemic to deal with and negotiate, making standup comedy happen in non-standup environments, ‘sad vs bleak’, and many many more memories and stories besides. It’s excellent and will make you lust for the third appearance… In the meantime though - please enjoy Jen’s resurrection!

item.title: Hannah Waddingham • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #114
item.itunes:title: Hannah Waddingham • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #114
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with hilarious acting and singing queen of the screen (and star of Ted Lasso) HANNAH WADDINGHAM!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with hilarious acting and singing queen of the screen (and star of Ted Lasso) HANNAH WADDINGHAM!


Oh what a treat you are in for this week, people… If you do not the depths of awesomeness contained in Hannah yet, you will by the end of this excellent episode as she and Brett cover all angles of this whole existence and cinema business. From the whole Ted Lasso phenomenon (including the steps taken to get there and how it all went down), karaoke, a very specific death scenario, hopes and fears after having a kid, some real truths and revelations of her day to day, when real life meets film horror, having a similar mind to young Brett here, and just all manner of goodness in between, this one’s a ray of light in an otherwise less bright and shiny world. ENJOY!

item.title: Stuart Laws • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #113
item.itunes:title: Stuart Laws • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #113
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the multi-faceted diamond STUART LAWS!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the multi-faceted diamond STUART LAWS!


Multi-faceted, as you will hear from Brett’s intro, by way of having multiple fingers in multiple cake and pies - but for the most part as you will also hear, the foundation is all things funny. Bear in mind that this was an episode recorded before lockdown was a fully functional thing in society, so podcasts were still often being recorded in person in the same room. Something that we don’t hear so often these days - but it’s worth pointing out, just for sake of context. You’ll have a good time with this one, as they go into the whole lot - spirituality (which take a nice debate turn), nihilism, regrets… And that’s for starters! Enjoy the face to face chat goodness of Brett and Stuart Laws!

item.title: Archie Maddocks • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #112
item.itunes:title: Archie Maddocks • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #112
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with brilliant comic and author and playwright ARCHIE MADDOCKS!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with brilliant comic and author and playwright ARCHIE MADDOCKS!


A really nice time in Archie’s company here with he and Brett talking all that good talk about this whole life and cinema thing, including the role of plays and standup and how artifice is crucial, being a playwright in general, also being a comedian (so expect some good shop-talk from them two), having a family in the business - a widespread section of family at that, and childhood films that definitely do not stand up in the fullness of time. Great stuff as always - have fun!

item.title: Neil Flynn • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #111
item.itunes:title: Neil Flynn • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #111
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with treasured comic actor (Scrubs anyone?!) and improviser NEIL FLYNN!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with treasured comic actor and improviser NEIL FLYNN!


YES you know him as the janitor from Scrubs but folks there is a whole WORLD of Neil that you ought to know… He’s been deep in the improv and theatre game for a good amount of years and has chops beyond belief, so just know that you are in safe hands here with him and Brett. The only unsafe hands you might experience are those of whatever internet providers were behind this particular connection as Neil didn’t have the smoothest line… Forget about that though as the content is the winner right here and you’ll get to hear a wonderful background and present from Neil, going into his days on Scrubs, his roles on such films as Magnolia and The Fugitive for heck’s sake, The Middle series, and his mantra “This is fine”. What a mantra. WHAT A MAN. It’s Neil Flynn!


EPISODE LINKS:

NEIL on IMDB

NEIL on SCRUBS WIKI

NEIL ARTICLE

(Neil isn't hugely available on social media so for more info, just run a quick NEIL FLYNN SCRUBS ACTOR Google and you'll be in good shape!)


BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON

item.itunes:summary:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with treasured comic actor and improviser NEIL FLYNN!


YES you know him as the janitor from Scrubs but folks there is a whole WORLD of Neil that you ought to know… He’s been deep in the improv and theatre game for a good amount of years and has chops beyond belief, so just know that you are in safe hands here with him and Brett. The only unsafe hands you might experience are those of whatever internet providers were behind this particular connection as Neil didn’t have the smoothest line… Forget about that though as the content is the winner right here and you’ll get to hear a wonderful background and present from Neil, going into his days on Scrubs, his roles on such films as Magnolia and The Fugitive for heck’s sake, The Middle series, and his mantra “This is fine”. What a mantra. WHAT A MAN. It’s Neil Flynn!


EPISODE LINKS:

NEIL on IMDB

NEIL on SCRUBS WIKI

NEIL ARTICLE

(Neil isn't hugely available on social media so for more info, just run a quick NEIL FLYNN SCRUBS ACTOR Google and you'll be in good shape!)

item.title: Larry Dean • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #110
item.itunes:title: Larry Dean • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #110
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent and very funny comic LARRY DEAN!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent and very funny comic LARRY DEAN!


A giddy lockdown-era gem, as the two connect via the modern miracle of the Zoom room to talk all things current and present, while mingling in some tangents and side-hustles including Larry’s uncanny impression of a London observation comedian (he’s Scottish by the way - it might not be quite as impressive if he was from London I guess), impressions of impressions, crabs in a bucket, g-g-g-ghosts, CGI - for or against?, and Skype date criticisms. So much happening, so little time - go listen, you’ll love it!

item.title: Toheeb Jimoh • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #109
item.itunes:title: Toheeb Jimoh • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #109
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the already legendary actor and Brett’s starring partner in Ted Lasso - it’s TOHEEB JIMOH!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the already legendary actor and Brett’s starring partner in Ted Lasso - it’s TOHEEB JIMOH!


A perfect opportunity to meet Toheeb, if you are yet to be familiarised with his work - this is a wonderful get together with he and Brett, which goes into his acting career so far from being young up to, well, still being young (but having had a good few proper roles on his resumé!). Of course you can catch him in the new series TED LASSO, where he and Brett star alongside one another, but you can and should also peep his work in the incredible ‘Anthony’ (linked below). But to focus on this podcast at hand - hear all about those two roles right there, as well his experiences in acting pre-mid-post lockdown, Fifa-inspired deaths and glories, and a nice amount of lawsuits racked up by he and Brett throughout. Awesome. ENJOY!

item.title: Natalia Tena • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #108
item.itunes:title: Natalia Tena • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #108
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the absolute gem of an actor, musician and superstar - but you might know her as Dorris from Superbob - NATALIA TENA!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the absolute gem of an actor, musician and all round superstar - but maybe you know her as Dorris from Superbob - it’s NATALIA TENA!


The perfect meetup right here and surely the one you’ve been waiting for - Brett teams back up with his starring partner of Superbob for a look at her movie favourites, classics and choice picks… Of course it does NOT end there, as we get to hear all about her past few months, life on a boat, her band Molotov Jukebox, death / sex / recipes, dogs, Firty First Dates and life from past to future. Beautiful stuff and one for the Superbob fans and PRE-Superbob fans (ie. if you haven’t seen it you will definitely be renting that STAT after listening to this). Enjoy Natalia!

item.itunes:title: Rob Delaney • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #107
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with actor, comedian and writer ROB DELANEY!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with actor, comedian and writer ROB DELANEY!


Pure goodness all round in this lovely bubbly get together, with Rob taking to the format and theme with effortless finesse. You know the deal by now, folks - a healthy dose of real life, humour of all the shades on the spectrum and ruminations, thoughts and theories on all that entails… Lockdown, growing into acting roles, his perspective on death with some very personal dealings over the past couple of years, horror as therapy, musicals, Deadpool 2, and all round delightful movie-based fun. People of podcasting persuasion - get to know (better) Rob Delaney!

item.title: Ed Gamble - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #104
item.itunes:title: Ed Gamble - The Resurrection • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #104
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with ED GAMBLE - I know what you’re all thinking, didn’t Ed die in an earlier episode yadda yadda yadda ALL WILL BE EXPLAINED!!!!..
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with ED GAMBLE - now I know what you’re all thinking, didn’t Ed die in an earlier episode yadda yadda yadda but HOLD ON… Explanations are needed.


It’s actually simple. Brett can resurrect previously dead guests, see. And that explains that! So here he is, loud and proud and hilarious as ever - Schmed Brambles himself! And yes he does address the whole name thing, don’t worry. Join he and Brett as they go even deeper into films and this whole life biz, with some good podcast talk about all things genies and metal, their nostalgia for London commuter rage, their nostalgia also for lockdown and what they miss from it, hipster Disney and SO much more… So join in and witness a live resurrection, you gotta see it it’s WILD. ENJOY!

item.title: Gillian Jacobs • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #103
item.itunes:title: Gillian Jacobs • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #103
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the absolute superstar actor and improviser GILLIAN JACOBS!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the absolute superstar actor and improviser GILLIAN JACOBS!


So much joy to hear the star of Community, Love, Don’t Think Twice and tons more having a proper FTBBW-style chat with Brett, and hear her own cinematic heavy hitters that are key to her life. She is also very generous and polite when Brett accidentally Britta’s her name* so keep an ear out for that gem…!

*Okay that’s a very specific Community one for the real heads…

Hear it all, from her Pittsburgh days, to her McCauley Culkin diversions, acting as a young’un, being exposed to films way above her recommended age, crying tips and the Malkovich emotional bootcamp, being a serious kid and outer monologues, dinner theatre, of course Community, and all her recent and past roles and MORE! Super great and pure podcast entertainment - you’ll love it.

item.title: Richard Osman • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #102
item.itunes:title: Richard Osman • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #102
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent presenter, writer and comic RICHARD OSMAN!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent presenter, writer and comic RICHARD OSMAN!


A great one again this week, all conjured via the magic of zoom, as Brett chats to yet another national treasure about all things mortal, existential and cinematic. We catch Richard in the midst of writing a new book, but go back into the past which involves his days dropping antacids (zero indigestion here), being defenceless against father-son moments in film, catching blockbusters upon release, being emotionally available, a ‘surprise Neason’ (I wrote that note but forgot why so I’m as intrigued as you are, dear listener), hot takes and fun with tropes. A goody for sure - please enjoy!


* Buddy Peace production note: me again… just a brief one to mention, Richard’s line wasn’t the best quality. item.itunes:summary:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent presenter, writer and comic RICHARD OSMAN!


A great one again this week, all conjured via the magic of zoom, as Brett chats to yet another national treasure about all things mortal, existential and cinematic. We catch Richard in the midst of writing a new book, but go back into the past which involves his days dropping antacids (zero indigestion here), being defenceless against father-son moments in film, catching blockbusters upon release, being emotionally available, a ‘surprise Neason’ (I wrote that note but forgot why so I’m as intrigued as you are, dear listener), hot takes and fun with tropes. A goody for sure - please enjoy!


* Buddy Peace production note: me again… just a brief one to mention, Richard’s line wasn’t the best quality. Somewhere in the connection things dropped and this was the resulting version Brett was left with. If you let your ears adjust you won’t have a hard time, but I just wanted to let you know ahead of time. Thanks kindly!

item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the very funny and super active comedian / personal trainer THANYIA MOORE!


A delightful chat with Brett and Thanyia, which goes into her journey from dancer to comedian and everything in between, zoom and comedy - and the perils therein, some deep and fascinating afterlife thoughts, her self care regime and how she’s implemented it in her daily life, and her criminologist leanings… So much to unravel right here and it’s all golden, so please people, take some time to enjoy and get to know Thanyia through the films that meant the most to her!

item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with JAMES ACASTER - but wait… Didn’t he die in episode 1, all those years ago…??? Huh…


Well the answer to that is - yes! BUT - Brett has had time to practice some skills in the area of the afterlife and has managed to bring James back to life and HERE HE IS! So ladies and gentlemen, please expect some grand fun and joy right here with new questions, a couple of surprises and all kinds of aferlife entertainment! You’ll love it. Thank you for being around for over 100 episodes - your listening ears are incredibly appreciated. Here’s to many more!

item.title: Sharon Stone • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #99
item.itunes:title: Sharon Stone • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #99
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the incredible, the legendary, the downright glorious SHARON STONE!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the incredible, the legendary, the downright glorious SHARON STONE!


I was going to start with “You may remember Sharon from such films as…”, but of course - that ‘may’ is redundant and superfluous. You KNOW her from such films as Basic Instinct, Sliver, Casino and SO so many more, and her filmography is as strong as it gets with appearances in all kinds of great movies dating back to the early 80’s. She and Brett meet in her garden (with a remote Brett in his house), for a very fun, interesting and revealing chat which goes into her past acting experiences, life and important work she’s been involved with around the world. Truly fascinating, you’ll love this one.


BRETT'S FILM RECOMMENDATION FOR THIS WEEK: '13th' (Netflix and streaming platforms)

item.title: Dane Baptiste (Revisited) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein
item.itunes:title: Dane Baptiste (Revisited) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein
item.itunes:subtitle: Dearest listeners! Please be welcome to a very special episode of Films To Be Buried With, as Brett revisits episode 23 with comedian Dane Baptiste, and catches up with him for 10 minutes up top.
item.description:
Dearest listeners! Please be welcome to a very special episode of Films To Be Buried With, as Brett revisits episode 23 with comedian Dane Baptiste. With events unfolding over the past week, it felt right to shine a light on a past episode (this one from December 13th 2018) but also catch up with Dane about everything happening at this moment. The two will catch up again soon, but in the meantime, here’s Brett and Dane - firstly for about 10 minutes, and then the past episode following.


Original writeup from episode 23:

LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he and his guest go deep into the subject of mortality via cinema, and this week he is joined by comedian and fully trained sharp-eyed popular culture sniper DANE BAPTISTE!


A few polite words before we begin… And this may shock you to hear…

…but POP CULTURE IS NOT YOUR FRIEND.

Now we have that out of the way, you’re all set to get VERY deep into all kinds of rabbit-holes from where Dane will pluck you and then show you the inner-workings of the matrix that is around us… A fascinating chat, which includes some goodies involving Dane discovering his own creative journey ahead of him, theories on all sorts (death, cinema, culture, the lot), being raised by women and the “boys don’t cry” attitude, hood films, the secrets behind the media, 90’s black stereotypes in film, the importance of representation, guns, martial arts, and just all manner of jewels being strewn around all over the shop. Marvellous. Take your Limitless pills and hold on tight - this is a heavy one! Oh, shoutouts to Showgirls, Wesley Snipes and To Wong Foo too.


LINKS FOR THIS EPISODE:

DANE BAPTISTE on TWITTER

DANE on THE INTERNET

DANE on INSTAGRAM

SUNNY D


BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON

item.title: Tom Allen (live @ Islington Town Hall) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #98
item.itunes:title: Tom Allen (live @ Islington Town Hall) • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #98
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the uproarious and hilarious TOM ALLEN live at Islington Town Hall!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the uproarious and hilarious TOM ALLEN live at Islington Town Hall!


…Of course, the fact that this is a live recording IMMEDIATELY shows the vintage of this episode, as of course no live episodes have been happening of late (unless you count a show as being recorded live while it’s being recorded?), so it’s a really unique treat and a welcome break from the zoom recordings that we are all becoming attuned to. Not that there’s anything wrong with them. But there’s something about the crowd sound and that live on stage feel that really shines out in the lockdown era. So please enjoy a very loose, fun and somewhat naughty show with Brett and Tom!

item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the absolutely wonderful comic and television hero SARAH MILLICAN!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the absolutely wonderful comic and television hero SARAH MILLICAN!


A proper giddy thrill in this time of extended oddness, which will revive your senses and bring a grin to your face, and your ears. Your ears will grin. She and Brett get down to business on everything, including those unfortunately all too familiar canceled plans, tricks with applause, joke dynamics with her partner, post-tour stress migraines, anaesthetic vs afterlife, sleeping through subplots, PANIC CUT!, cinema gorillas, Tom Hanks, walking out of plays and out and out humping. This has it ALL. Please to enjoy, SARAH MILLICAN!

item.title: Richard Herring • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #96
item.itunes:title: Richard Herring • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #96
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the yet another national treasure, it’s comedian and podcaster RICHARD HERRING!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the yet another national treasure, it’s comedian and podcaster RICHARD HERRING!


Brett is zooming things up VERY nicely right now with a solid gold cast of legends in this lockdown period! You wouldn’t know that anything was wrong at all! I mean, minus the references and such. Anyway this is another example of greatness as Richard, star of RHLSTP (that’s how you say it) and comedy and all things awesome takes a trip the afterlife cinema with Brett, to dig deep upon all things cinematic through his life. Some great chat up top about home schooling and the perils thereof, country life and how said homeschooling has delivered valuable family time, the potential and present effects of lockdown and quarantine on comedy and what that means on a greater scale, and a ton more with some choice meanderings. Have a good’un folks, you’ll love it.

item.title: Dolly Alderton • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #95
item.itunes:title: Dolly Alderton • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #95
item.itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the brilliant podcaster, journalist and author (non-fictioner) and all round sincere talent DOLLY ALDERTON!
item.description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the brilliant podcaster, journalist and author (non-fictioner) and all round sincere talent DOLLY ALDERTON!


Ultra fun times to be had this week folks, as Brett teams up with Dolly via the medium of a very well known social communication app that rhymes with “BOOM”, “DOOM” or if you like “ZOOM” (…wait, hold up…), and has a super great chat which delves deep into all aspects of Dolly’s life and loves via the medium of cinema! Ohhh it’s a goodie. This may be the episode from which ‘non-fictioner’ becomes a thing too. You watch this space and mark my words. A solid introduction which gets into all things writing and the process behind it all, having ‘natter happy friends’ (zooming and facetiming all over the place), good writing talk, EPN (you’ll find out what that cheery acronym means), being intimidated by film geeks (uh oh…) and a whole ton more - some real gems right here for you, everyone. So please, take yourself some time from the day and enjoy this lovely chat with Brett and Dolly!


LINKS FOR THIS EPISODE:

DOLLY on TWITTER!

DOLLY on THE INTERNET!

A solid introduction which gets into all things writing and the process behind it all, having ‘natter happy friends’ (zooming and facetiming all over the place), good writing talk, EPN (you’ll find out what that cheery acronym means), being intimidated by film geeks (uh oh…) and a whole ton more - some real gems right here for you, everyone. So please, take yourself some time from the day and enjoy this lovely chat with Brett and Dolly!
