item.title: Nish Kumar - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #3
item.itunes:title: Nish Kumar - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #3
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the debut episode of ’Films To Be Buried With' with Brett Goldstein! Episode three brings you the comedic power and super scientifical awesomeness of NISH KUMAR as special guest!
item.description:
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to 'Films To Be Buried With' with Brett Goldstein! Episode three at that! Many thanks for returning, it’s a pleasure to have you aboard. Your gift for returning? Another stunning guest, of course - and this week we have the wonderful NISH KUMAR, star of The Mash Report, MANY shows on the TV and his own forthcoming show ‘It’s In Your Nature To Destroy Yourselves’.


A HUGE chat right here with Brett and Nish, who get down to some very intense subjects as their conversational path weaves and winds. Everything from teen flicks and the age Nish got into them (very late by all accounts), existential horror, his own family movie times, the insanely wide world of Hindi movies, defending films and a very interesting section regarding how difficult it can be to separate art from the artist, in light of recent revelations and allegations about many men directly involved in the entertainment industry - all via the immense world of cinema and their personal journey throughout. You’ll enjoy this one, folks - download and devour!


––––– ––––– –––––


THIS WEEK'S LINKS:


• NISH KUMAR on TWITTER!

item.title: Katherine Ryan - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #2
item.itunes:title: Katherine Ryan - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #2
item.itunes:subtitle: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to 'Films To Be Buried With' with Brett Goldstein! What better way to follow up such a banger of a first episode than by treating you to a slammer of a follow up - please welcome to the podcast television’s KATHE...
item.description:
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to 'Films To Be Buried With' with Brett Goldstein! Thank you ever so much for downloading/streaming last week’s debut episode with James Acaster, we very much hope you had fun with that one… What better way to follow up such a banger of a first episode than by treating you to a true and living slammer of a follow up - please welcome to the podcast television’s KATHERINE RYAN!


First thing’s first - mention must be made of the fact that this was recorded in a car. This is probably extremely apparent but just in case you’re curious as to why there’s a lot of very motor-sounding background noise, that’s what’s happening. So with that said - you are in for a treat, as Brett and Katherine get down to the real deal serious topics with a grin and a laugh, deliberating and considering topics such as whether they want to buried in the first place, mortality and how having kids can shape one’s view on it, her family film nights showing nothing but the finest in Irish movies, the effects of ‘AALS’ (Altitude Associated Lachrymosity Syndrome - basically getting emotional on planes), and early cinema romances, but SO MUCH MORE! A wonderful backseat chat (they have a driver, don’t worry) with Brett and Katherine, where you can place yourself directly in between them and enjoy the goods therein. Get involved!


––––– ––––– –––––


THIS WEEK'S LINKS:


• KATHERINE RYAN on TWITTER!

• KATHERINE RYAN's 'IN TROUBLE' on NETFLIX!

• KATHERINE on THE INTERNET!

item.title: James Acaster - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #1
item.itunes:title: James Acaster - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #1
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the debut episode of ’Films To Be Buried With' with Brett Goldstein! Kicking things off for the debut episode is comedian JAMES ACASTER! Have fun!
item.description:
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to 'Films To Be Buried With' with Brett Goldstein! What makes this situation extra special is that you are on board from the ground floor - this is the VERY FIRST episode! Last week's was a teaser (which you hopefully managed to catch), but this is the full official debut. And what better way to kick things off with than by inviting comedian JAMES ACASTER aboard as the first guest!


Listen to Brett and James wade all the way into the deep end through life, death, afterlife, love, philosophy, childhood and all manner of delicious tangents, as Brett teases a huge amount of film selections out of James. Expect to hear about James's plot spoiling OCD as a kid, his Kettering/Banbury roots, an existential lost dinosaur theory, the pain and horror of open mic nights, horror movies, Edinburgh Fringe, New Zealand and a good amount of revelations and nuggets of inspiration. But so much more besides INCLUDING his epic four part Netflix special 'Repertoire'! PLEASE ENJOY!


––––– ––––– –––––


THIS WEEK'S LINKS:


• JAMES ACASTER on TWITTER!

• JAMES'S 4 PART 'REPERTOIRE' SPECIAL on NETFLIX!

• JAMES on THE INTERNET!

item.title: Films To Be Buried With - official teaser trailer
item.itunes:title: Films To Be Buried With - official teaser trailer
item.itunes:subtitle: Ladies and gentlemen, here is your host BRETT GOLDSTEIN to run down what to expect from his brand new podcast ‘FILMS TO BE BURIED WITH’, every Thursday from next week!
item.description:
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you ever so kindly for showing up to the OFFICIAL teaser trailer for the 'Films To Buried With' podcast!


Join your loving and lovable host BRETT GOLDSTEIN (comedian, writer and film obsessive) as he gives you the rundown on what you can expect from the show, the themes and formats and much more besides.


It'll be a grand one folks, and it's so great that you're here for the preview. Be sure to come back for the first episode featuring the marvellous JAMES ACASTER, with a glorious episode of film fun and biographical goodness for you to enjoy.


Thank you kindly and see you next week!


––––– ––––– –––––


THIS WEEK'S LINKS:
